<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Network history bootstrap peers</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v2/networkhistory/bootstrap"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get a list of IPFS peers that can be used to initialise a new data node with network history

## Request

<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

A successful response.
